website_summaries.verdict: The majority of the consumers welcomed the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 35 Turbo with so much joy and pride. They agreed that the shoe is suitable for both indoor and outdoor running and walking activities. They were contented with this running shoe's lightweight structure and excellent cushioning. Most of the testers were made happy, satisfied with the combination of all the materials and technologies employed to the outsole, midsole, and upper area of the shoe. It's fantastic construction and performance prove that this shoe is a successful release from Nike.
pros: The majority of the consumers said that the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 35 Turbo is comfortable
A lot of users mentioned that the shoe is lightweight
A good number of testers commented that the running footwear has excellent cushioning
Based on the reviews, the running shoe is fast
It is a nice-looking shoe according to those who have bought it
The shoe is best suited for easy and long runs as well as walking and marathon training
cons: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 35 Turbo lacks heel support, as noted by some users
Several buyers commented that the running shoe is not durable
The sole started to wear off after several uses only

customer_reviews.title: Outsole Wears Away Too Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the shoe, except for the fact that after just one month of running about 15 miles per week, the outsole has already worn away at the outside edge of the heel. I've not had this issue with other shoes. I think it's a design flaw: the outsole is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great shock absorption, excellent running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2 surgeries for spinal disk deterioration, so jogging can be tough for me. Of the proper running shoes I tried from Brooks, Saucony, New Balance, etc, I found these Nikes have the softest sole while still providing good support for my relatively flat feet (I use some arch support insoles with them). The sock-like fit and exceptional shock absorption really save my knees and back when I jog. Really like them.
customer_reviews.author: James UTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe, too narrow forefoot for me
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool looking shoes, but they just didn’t fit right to me. The forefoot area is abot 25% too narrow for my foot. At first it felt fine, then walking around the house for a few minutes it felt tight. I have had this problem with the Pegasus series, but if I buy ‘wide’ often the heel and midfoot are too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sole separating from shoe after five months.
customer_reviews.text: These are/were nice looking shoes. I never ran in them, just wore them for normal walking. After five months the left sole is separating from the shoe. Unacceptable and inexcusable for a $189 pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walden

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find Black 4E
customer_reviews.text: I paid a few bucks more for the black-gunsmoke color but am fine as they are hard to find. I've worn this Nike Pegasus shoes for all 35 years they've been produced. When you find a great 4E shoe why change? I have tried other more stylish sneakers, and they're fine for a few hours, but the Pegasus shoes I wear every single day, all day long. As a teacher I'm on my feet a lot, walking around a large campus, and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AlohaMal

customer_reviews.title: Like I learned in basketball never short on shoes if ...
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda sketched out spending 120 on running shoes. I only used to spend that much on basketball shoes. Like I learned in basketball never short on shoes if you plan to use them a lot. These shoes have tons of cushion and adapt to your feet very well. I have very flat feet and had problems with other running shoes but these are fine. Worth it if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least one size larger
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of the shoe is not designed for the correct fit. The lower part of lace (where lace finishes and the toe box starts) is abnormally small and applies a lot of pressure across a small line over your foot. It was painful to walk for more than 10-15 minutes. Returned the shoe and got a size larger (usually wear 11, ordered 12) and it is a perfect fit! The shoe is fantastic and well designed!
customer_reviews.author: Ardi

customer_reviews.title: Significant change from Pegasus 34
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair from the Pegasus Zoom line. My last pair was the 34. While there is nothing wrong with the 35, they just don't fit the same. I have very narrow feet and like for my running shoes to fit snugly. The 34's were perfect. Everything changed with the 35. They don't feel the same. My feet move around more inside them, especially at the heel. I'll make these work, but I'm going to have to find a new running shoe for my next pair. No issues with the transaction. Seller was great...easy does it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: If you order the black shoes it will have a white sole
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great and I'm keeping it but it doesn't match the shoe I ordered in the description above being all black including the sole of the shoe. What I received was a black upper and white sole. I like it but not what I wanted. Comfy shoes so I'm keeping them anyway. But I'd prefer to receive the exact item not something different. That's all
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable running shoes on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort, great feel and fit. The toe box is perfect even for some wider feet, they're not as narrow as most NIKE shoes and they have a bit of give. Cushioning is excellent all the way through your full stride. They are also mostly fabric so breathing ability is great, I never feel as if my feet are too hot when training or running. This is my 3rd pair of Nike Zoom Pegasus absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carlolo23

customer_reviews.title: Already ran 2 days with these shoes. It could ...
customer_reviews.text: Already ran 2 days with these shoes. It could be just me, but I ran much faster and easier with these than with my other running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mihail Manolov

customer_reviews.title: For me... Just too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoes, the modern design looks good, I received some compliments. The only problem is that these shoes are way too narrow. I have used several brands and models of running shoes, all having their pros and cons, but no matter what I have always been comfortable with the usual size, not with these ones! I could only run for a very few miles, my feet just felt cramped so I had to use very thin socks. I ended up using some other running shoes. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM&M

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The bottom back of the heel on both shoes is already separating after only wearing for a few weeks. I've owned cheaper shoes that have last years and these haven't lasted a month! Poor quality, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Nike never disappoints. They are really comfortable and well worth the price. Initially it took some time to break in and was a bit slippery but eventually it was just right for my legs. These are now my go to every day shoes. Excellent for running and working AND you can also wear them as casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Zain syed

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bottom ripped after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: After 5 uses I played a casual game of pickup basketball in these shoes and the sole ripped so that I cut put my hand through the rubber and to the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Maiken Gehsmann

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: These shoes may be some of the lightest I've ever owned. Very comfortable fit. Feels like they add to forward momentum when running. Not ideal for cross-training or lifting, but perfect for running fast.
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who just started running last month. He had an old, beat up pair of off-brand sneakers that were hurting his feet. I did a ton of research before purchasing these Nike shoes, knowing that Nike does a great job, but not sure which model to get for my husband's needs. Since my husband doesn't do any serious running (yet), I thought these would be a great option, since he's more interested in speed, rather than distance, running. He loves them and now that I'm looking into running, too, I'll probably get a pair for myself as well. Great quality shoe, fast and reliable shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki A.

customer_reviews.title: snug fit but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Liked the lighter feel than my previous Nike Air Structures which are a good stability shoes but a bit heavier. Overpronation motion control was not that noticeably different for the Pegasus, but I only just started running in them. Only time will tell, and if I had to add some arch support through an insert, that would be fine. The shoe is nicely cushioned, but the outsole is firm , unlike the Nike Lunar Glides which have too soft of a tread(I had to abandon those a couple years ago because of this). Overall a well balanced shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jonpark2019

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the one (-:
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a while for light and strong running shoes and it looks like I finally found them. I do not often write reviews but I felt that this time I have to. Now that I have them for few months I can strongly recommend them. Hold the feet perfectly, you can run, jump light weights or anything you want. (I dont play ball games with them). They still look like they are new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Narrow Feet
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled to find shoes that fit my feet with many of the shoe vendors discontinuing the narrow width sizes. These fit really well (even though they are not sold as narrow) and are light but supportive. So far multiple marathons (this is my second set of this model) and they've held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new shoes and has creases on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The Shoes came in a blank box and looks like it was maybe used? It has some creases on the bottom like it was worn previously. A bit disappointed with the shoes. It said that they were brand new but by looking at the photo you can tell they are not brand new. Buyer beware. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yet able to handle high mileage!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of higher-end Nike shoes. Before I had the Nike Odyssey React’s and they were great for a solid year. I got these new shoes this week and I can already tell they are faster, a little lighter, very comfortable, and a sleek design. I look forward to adding many more miles in the upcoming months!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: looked cool online, but reeeally cheap in person..
customer_reviews.text: Boy, mediocre. Where do I begin, uh hey Nike get your freaking sizing right. Also what's with the heel? They sink in the back, causing depression of the heel with every step and making a straight line feel like walking on a taught fishing net--uphill. These shoes are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor L

customer_reviews.title: light-weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are not too heavy for jogging. They allow amble air circulation. They are somewhat more expensive than comparable models.
customer_reviews.author: uspswilm1

customer_reviews.title: Best Fit of any Runner
customer_reviews.text: Nike Pegasus has been the only running shoe that has ever fit me comfortably and has been for the past 20 years. Tried others, but not as good of fit. They are slightly narrower than other shoes, so is my foot. I see they make a wider version now, so should be able to fit people with normal width feet. Very light and the new material is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They give him support and traction for all of the sports-related activities he pursues. They wear well and look good too! My one word of caution is that, apparently because of store display, they arrived without a lid. They were still new, and not a gift, so that was okay for us.
customer_reviews.author: Donna E

customer_reviews.title: Go half a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Looks, fit and comfort, one of the best Running sneakers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Wesam

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising Equals Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I was purchasing the Black pair with the BLACK soles. It’s shown as black on black in the photo when purchasing. HOWEVER I received black with WHITE soles. I saw that color combo when choosing and specifically did not want those. I wanted the BLACK pair with the BLACK soles as shown in the photo when purchasing. This is extremely misleading and just plain false advertising. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Honest Review with 1+ years of wearing
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second pair! Had to just in case cause I couldn’t find the gold Moab shoes anywhere, not even eBay in my size. My first pair I’m going on a year plus wearing and they still feel great! I’ve had 5 surgeries on my feet; broken both of them and crushed my heel. It’s soooo difficult finding good and comfortable shoes for me to wear. These Zoom Pegasus 35s, the Flyease and 36s are perfect and super lightweight. I now own 6 pairs of these zoom Pegasus shoes and I want more! Awesome shoes! Awesome designs!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Everyone compliments the shoe game.  That’s how U know U got a nice pair
customer_reviews.text: Everyone compliments the shoe game. That’s how U know U got a nice pair. ... my fiancé , friends, co workers and family asking for the link 🤔🤣👍👍
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are falsely advertised, Shoe size said it fits 9.5 men/12 women however it is actually a 12 in men size. Buyer beware - would not recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: RG3

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying nikes for years, not any more. I just use them, maybe 5/6 time, and the front of the shoe broke. Worst of all that when I called nijes costumers service they were the worst of the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nicest shoe ever bought . Lightweight very comfortable great style love it 👊👊👊👊👊👊
customer_reviews.author: Darren J Dilks

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have flat wide feet and though they are a snug fit they have not caused any foot pain, blisters or sore areas and I wore them 3 days at Disney world so lots of walking. Seem to be true to size since I wear 12 and ordered 12 with a good fit. Holding up well so far. Good support
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Karnes

customer_reviews.title: great fit and cushioned
customer_reviews.text: these shoe are great and stylish! I use them for my short AND long runs, track workouts and some races. well cushioned, arch support, neutral shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my Son's Feet
customer_reviews.text: My son has always worn Nike shoes. For some reason these seem to hurt is feet and he is unable to run in them. It's a shame because they are brand new. I even tried getting different inserts and it doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS VERY EXPENSIVE, EXCELLENT MATERIALS, FULL OF SUPPORT AND COMFORT. GETS ATTENTION.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: Wrong image for “black” style
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the “black” shoes which are pictured as all black shoes. However, I received a different style with white soles and speckled black and gray.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable good foot support
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the shoe fits. It's comfortable and provides good foot support. I was told to buy these shoes as a baseline from Nike and I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son, Upon receiving he called me and say "mami these are very nice shoes thank you" so imaging the satisfaction I felt buying something that it gets to be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Adela Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good fit as it says but cheaper at Outlet market.
customer_reviews.text: It is good but this model is already in the outlet market. Cheaper than Amazon’ price there.
customer_reviews.author: hyunggeun cho

customer_reviews.title: Third pair!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to running shoe. Straight out of the box, on to my feet and off on a 19 mile training run.
customer_reviews.author: bmw54

customer_reviews.title: Pegasus Delivers Again.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Nike Pegasus models for about 9 years for running. They're light enough for quick sessions, responsive and provides good cushion for long runs. They have really good life, I tend to retire them at around 650-700 miles, logging normally 60-80 miles a week they last around 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Very durable and comfortable. It's a good all-purpose training shoe, albeit over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sole.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband for his birthday in January. By March the sole was already coming away. Not great for an expensive Nike product.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Low Mileage Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 35's
customer_reviews.text: Received my New Pegasus 35's, and I'm so Excited to put the Miles on these. They fit great, love the tongue and taller heal, makes it uber simple to put on. Excellent cushioning for the norm, as well as for my Back(problematic). Excellent Breathe ability for my feet and love the fact that they glow in the dark. Recommend purchasing these for any Fitness oriented lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: MattyB

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive for the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe - used it in a 10K race... performed well... HOWEVER that being said, my son bought his pair in a silver gray color from the Nike site and paid 1/2 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Engelman

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, it’s my second pair. Training for a marathon and my feet feel great. I’m a woman but find the men’s shoe works better for me. Also, the seller was prompt in responding to a question and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great running shoe. Ran 5 mile straight out the box with no issues. Nice return of energy, cushion is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrious Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Only had these shoes 3-4 months and the sole is coming off. Major disappointment. Need our money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clawson are Awesome

customer_reviews.title: NIce sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This item was for my son and he loves it. Very comfortable and stylish. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy8095

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. This version of Nike Pegasus absorbs ground shock better than the last version of owned Pegasus. I haven't experienced any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Red_Bird_08

customer_reviews.title: Foot pillows
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are awesome. The soles are pillowy and the upper really form fits to your feet right out of the box. Shoes arrived on time as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Prime-time

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered these shoes. He has a very hard time finding his size in the stores. They look very nice on him.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Filby

customer_reviews.title: Great for my lower back
customer_reviews.text: Nice padding and arch support, changed everything when I started wearing these to work instead of dress shoes!
customer_reviews.author: JBCin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Husband very happy with these shoes. Fit was correct and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: julzfavz

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn't offer best price guarantee
customer_reviews.text: The toebox and arch were quite tight. The design is very cool. Disappointing is the fact that I was to find these for under $100 after having paid $130 excluding shipping. I believe an organization as large and powerful as Amazon must provide a price match guarantee. Let's see ??
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, squeaky cushion?
customer_reviews.text: The sole squeaks when you walk. Apparently a common issue for this model of pegasus.
customer_reviews.author: Grillin'

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely manner. I was so excited to get another pair in a different color. A very comfortable shoe. I get tons of compliments on them everywhere I travel for work.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I like that the delivery was on time and the product was in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I used to be a Nike fan, but then I found ASICS where more comfortable, these Nikes are changing my mind again
customer_reviews.author: Erick Calmet Del Castillo

customer_reviews.title: PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS ITEM, WOULD BUY FROM THIS SELLER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it . Accurate to actual shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Good Nike product , wish it was authenticated using vechains blockchain tech .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: Saw that this shoe was rated as “the fastest “. Due to weight and springiness. I run 5-10 miles a day and I know what a good shoe feels like. This shoe is awkward feeling on the foot and not a good pick for training OR race day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe as I've used before however they sent the wrong size and because of work I'm unable to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Schermerhorn

customer_reviews.title: Love this year's design
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy anything different. Love this year's design, the long tongue and heal for slipping into the shoe. The shoes change style and subtle designs each year but have always kept the general structure of the shoe the same. Run between 10 to 15 miles a week and have never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he had tried a pair on in the store and loved them. They are the most comfortable shoes he ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband. he had tried a pair on in the store and loved them. They are the most comfortable shoes he has worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dedorah C. Bolen

customer_reviews.title: A very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. I feel that I walk in the clouds. Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.author: Olmedo Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for outdoor track n field training. So far they have been comfortable, nice cushion, and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Beans Cafe

customer_reviews.title: My mind is going a mile an hour
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is the best thing ever. Anyone in the world can write anything they want about any product. So you know you are getting the best possible information. Wore these while training for the Rabies Awareness run.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel very comfortable and good quality. I used this shoes every single day! For work, to run, to workout (boxing), play soccer sometimes, and to go out. I am very please on how comfortable the shoes feel, how long they have last, and how good the price is for this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: With nowhere to shop for my husband new runners I ordered these--super love them. He said they are one of his favorite pairs he has had. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good looking and confortable shoes, return policy is not
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I ordered a larger size. However the shoes is actually true to size, so it did not fit. Liked the shoes, but had to return. Paying $14 for the return postage and a long wait for the refund are not cool... still waiting
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: My son runs cross country this is his second pair great you
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who runs and works out. He loves them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not comfortable and do not seem like their are authentic Nike shoes. I would avoid.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyAgain

customer_reviews.title: My Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but .....
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was delivered with a cut by the side on the Nike logo.
customer_reviews.author: Omobolaji Badmus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product but sets me to far forward in the shoe and hurts my calves.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Davidson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are so comfortable!!! I wore my first pair out ..this is my 2nd pair and will most likely buy a third one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward shoe fit that came in a white shoe box, fake.
customer_reviews.text: Awkward shoe fit, and little mid foot cushion like past Pegasus models that have. Weird that shoe box came in plain white, with nike shoe info sticker on side, fake. Better off going to outlet store, instead of buying online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good support in arch!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Nike shoes I've owned. Great comfort in toe area as I run.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for everyday wear and running
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe for everyday wear and running just beware of the stretch marks after a week on the white cushion no matter how careful you are (if that bothers you)
customer_reviews.author: Jubin

customer_reviews.title: Made with quality in mind.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality running shoe. Lots a long time, I'll use it running and weights for 9+ months before significant wearing starts.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Nike Air Zoom tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I love everything about the shoes. I sent em back because I found em half of the price in a retail store. Too bad 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were very comfortable on my first 5 mile walk
customer_reviews.text: They are so lightweight and comfortable. I also like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, great cushion. Really like them. They do run a little bit small IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Manaugh

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but too narrow. Had the 33s and 34s much more room!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandman711

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Nike is finally building shoes that are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kolinsky

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and arrived well ahead of schedule! They are a little on the tight side but not uncomfortably so. If I was trying on in store prolly would have went up a half size from what my norm is.
customer_reviews.author: JACOB G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is one of my husband's favorite. He loved them so much he bought a second pair and wants another. He loves the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were used when they arrived. This was not mentioned in the description when I purchased them. They cleaned the shoes up, but they’ve clearly been well worn. I do not appreciate the dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sole don’t last like previous Pegasus
customer_reviews.text: Have had other Nike Pegasus and they have been great. This pair the sole don’t last not happy with purchase. Don’t think I buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cd79

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and smooth running
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel great, super comfortable and they also look good. I usually run 5-10k on concrete. They are comfy, responsive and provide good cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Benoit Marquet

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. very light weight. makes running very easy and comfortable. the shoe is very light and flexible when running. the support feels great and going on long runs, 10miles is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Janice Furuta

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sneaker. Pegasus model never fails to have a comfortable sneaker year in and year out.
customer_reviews.author: JY987123

customer_reviews.title: Quite a big style change to still be called a Pegasus.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great so far. I go back to the original Pegasus so I have seen a lot of changes. My caution that has been voiced by others is that they run a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: David Linton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, training for a marathon made easy with these. Super light and easy on feet. These are my second pair. First pair lasted for 700 miles I hope these will do same thing.
customer_reviews.author: #1papabear

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he was happy
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clay

customer_reviews.title: Quick Easy Fits
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely one of the easiest best purchases that fits perfectly. Usually am worried about ordering things online like shoes but these fit to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Justin
